mapper.select: SELECT id,purchase_num,last_act_date from repurchase where repurchase.id in (${userIdList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY last_act_date;

SELECT last_act_date ,SUM(IF(repurchase=1,purchase_num,0)) AS repurchase_shop_num,SUM(IF(repurchase=0,purchase_num,0)) as no_repurchase_num_sum ,count(sku) as sku_num from repurchase where
and address like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
GROUP BY last_act_date ORDER BY last_act_date
